Me and my friend spent a week in this apartment in May 2014. Location is quite nice — there are a lot of shops and bakeries in the neigbourhood. Puplic transport stops on next street and brings you to the city center.
Apartment is very well equipped, you can find everything you need there, including a hairdryer and an iron. It's a real living space, not a faceless hotel room.

Alex is a very friendly host, he answered to all our touristic questions and even helped with printing our tickets. Thanks a lot!

Price / quality ratio = perfect.

We had a great stay in Alex's apartment - 14 nights total from the middle to the end of May.  The big bedroom and living room had plenty of space for us to relax.  It was very nice to have a kitchen and washing machine for travelling comfort.  The apartment is located in a convenient area with access to groceries, restaurants, and all other daily needs.  Very quiet at night.  We walked all over town from the apartment - hardly even used the metro because everything is easy to reach on foot (if you like walking).  The bedrooms both have access to a courtyard and fresh air, while the living room also has a big window.  The bed was comfortable.  Nice to have free WiFi.

The only down-sides, which are minimal in relation to the extremely low price of the apartment, are the dated kitchen and bathroom.  The bathroom has all brown accessories (toilet, tub, sink, non-working bidet), a ceiling that is 3' lower than other rooms, no window, and a leak at the back of the toilet that looks like it has been patched numerous times.  None of this may bother you, it just depends how easily you are skeezed out.  The kitchen is also dated with no window, but we just did our cooking and then ate in the living room.  Either way, seeing that the price is SO affordable, the place was great.

I definitely recommend staying here if you are on a budget and just need somewhere convenient to sleep while exploring Athens.  No regrets with this choice - $400 for two weeks of accommodations!  Can't be beat.
Appartement bien situé,  assez grand. Alexandros est disponible et très serviable. bémol sur l'hygiène de la salle de bain et la cuisine.

Flat of Alexandros has 3 big room. All are comfortable and well equipped.

The Kitchen and bathroom could be refreshed.

From metro line is 20 minutes walk, but to Temple of Zeus is just 25 minutes by foot so we gave up using metro.

But for this price - this place is worth visiting.

I stayed at this apartment with my parents and brother in July for 8 nights. The pictures accurately shows what to expect. It's a great apartment for anyone that is travelling to Athens on a budget. The apartment is located in a convenient neighbourhood with lots of charm. You can find everything you need nearby. Although the kitchen and bathroom are outdated - you can't go wrong with the reasonable price.

Although we never met Alexandro, he was a good host and responded to messages promptly. He also left city maps in the apartment, which was super convenient.

I would recommend this apartment for anyone that is looking for a good deal in Athens!

Алекс отличный хост! Вежливый и отзывчивый.
Квартира, в целом, соответствует фотографиям. Из минусов можно выделить, пожалуй, только отсутствие занавески в ванной и отсутствие окна в кухне. В остальном, все понравилось.
Дом удачно расположен, на соседней улице есть все необходимые магазины, остановка общественного транспорта в сторону центра в трех минутах хотьбы.

Alexandros was very helpful and the apartment was lovely, much bigger than I imagined. It is lovely and quiet and a perfect place for exploring the city of Athens.  With shops very close by, great fishmongers, grocery and some amazing bakeries. We used it as a base for a week as a journalist and graphic designer working on projects in Greece.  Would definitely stay here again.

i stayed a week in Alex's home and it's very big. Kitchen has everything if u need to cook. Excellent WiFi connectio  & Supermarket. Bakery and an excellent gyro shop are all around the corner! Recommend if you're a famil. Since it's huge!

Alexandros fue un buen anfitrión, muy amable y acogedor, y estuvo disponible cuando lo necesitamos.
La casa es muy grande y cómoda, tiene un salón muy amplio con luz natural. La cama de la habitación de matrimonio también es grande, dispone de varios juegos de sábanas limpios y toallas a disposición del huésped.
La cocina dispone de todos los utensilios básicos para cocinar.
El barrio es muy tranquilo, con un supermercado a dos minutos caminando, una cafetería, restaurantes y tiendas.
¡Nuestra experiencia en casa de Alexandros ha sido perfecta!
The flat is ok and comfortable, perfect location and good price, we walked everywhere. We didn't meet Alexandros but he called us when we needed it, We would recommend it and go back if possible. :)
The appartment has a lots of space and we appreciated the pricing. We liked the surrounding area as there are a lot of shops (bakery, mini market, deli) and a bus station just around the corner.

Гостили в течение 10 дней. Отличная квартира. Есть абсолютно всё необходимое для комфортной жизни. Расположение отличное: рядом стадион, парк, остановка 209 автобуса, трамвай и метро в 15-20 минутах ходьбы, хороший дешевый супермаркет. Все достопримечательности рядом; дорога до пляжа (Коломаки) занимает 40 минут (5 трамвай; или 550 автобус, а потом 3 трамвай). Соотношение цена/качество оптимальное! Большое спасибо Алексу и его маме!
We stayed here during 10 days. Excellent three-room apartments. There is absolutely everything you need for a comfortable life. Location is excellent: close to the stadium, park, 209 bus stop, tram and metro in 15-20 minutes walk, good cheap supermarket. All attractions are near; the road to the beach (Kolomaki) takes about 40 minutes (tram 5; or bus 550 and then tram 3). Price/quality ratio is optimal. Very good! Thanks to Alex and to his mom!
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The apartment is new and comfortable, spacious and sunny. All the dishes and furniture in the kitchen and bathroom are new and functional. The neighborhood is quiet and residential; the building is surrounded by embassies and private clinics, an excellent neighborhood. The owner left a number of suggestions in a folder on the table and we listen many, such as eating out at interesting places. Because of this home it was a very pleasant stay in Athens.

Lovely renovated apartment in great area with excellent transport links. Roula made me feel very comfortable and welcome and met me at the apartment even though I arrived late.

In the apartment she has thought of everything from espresso machines to ironing boards to restaurant recommendations. She kept in touch making sure all was well and indeed I immediately felt like I was part of her extended family.

I'm already looking forward to me next stay.

This B&B is, in reality, a full apartment for guests. An apartment where is present the love of owner ( and her family) for the little things.
I suggest to reserve because is very confortable and well connected.

Highly recommended !!! Book it while you can.

I must extend my personal thanks to Roula. She is such a wonderful  person and kindest host. It was such a great pleasure to get to meet a warm/kind local host like her. This is something very personal that you could never get out of hotels.
I cannot thank her enough of how helpful she is for a traveler from far east like myself, who knows nothing about Athen/Aegean cultures.

Everything is real as it appears on the photo and functional. There are several antiques and art pieces that you can tell the good taste of the owner. Little balcony outside facing the apartment's cour yard is great at both day time/night time.

Location is very SAFE (this is very important in Athens) and convenient.
Easy access to/from airport to city center with buses / metro. The neighborhood has US embassy and a few others, so you should not worry walking around even at night time.

My first visit to Athen has become such a lovely / memorable trip thanks to Raula. I hope I will get a second chance to visit the city and again and my first choice would be the same place.

The flat resides in the top three or two locations in Athens. Just tens of meters away from it you'll find the first embassies, and little bit further away the Athens Concert Hall. It is a very safe and quiet area. The inner core of Athens, the Acropolis and the quarts in the vicinity are just two metro stations away.

As others have mentioned, Roula made sure you get to know all the best secrets of Athens. Take some time and read through the notebook containing the suggestions.

The flat itself has offers all the comforts one needs and no hotel can beat the atmosphere.  It has a wonderful balcony overlooking the beautiful old trees in the inner courtyard while in the same time giving you the overview of the entire sky. At least one dinner there is something I wholeheartedly recommend. Actually this kind of flat is the reason why you signed up with the Airbnb in the first place.

The hosts are warm and extremely helpful people. We had a couple of typical tourist dramas which all ended well mostly thanks to Roula and here adorable daughter and niece.

From the depth of my heart I recommend you to choose this appartment. I cannot imagine anything better for your stay in Athens.

The apartment is really beautiful and Roula and her daughter Ellie, very helpfull.  I arrived in the middle of the night because of a change in a flight and they manage to welcome us (my two children and me).  The appartment is in a quiet and central area, very easy.  We stayed only two nights (it was the end of our trip in Greece) but next time in Athens, I certainly will come back in Roula's place.
Thanks a lot!
Nice Property, good host and a great stay!

There is not good qualification enough (in starts) to point Roula's hospitality and her attention to us. Her place is a lovely "space" quite center in Athens where you will feel like home. Lovely furniture, incredibly confortable matress and very cool and fresh living-room/balcony. It's a relaxing place in the middle of these crazy and noisy city.

Although this valoration is to qualificate how is her appartment, I couldn't miss to say how lovely and nice she was with us, even arriving so late and able always to recommend us grate places to go. Roula, you're simply fantastic; keep smiling and travelling.

Roula was really considerate to give us all info for her apt and the surroundings, even though i just stayed there for a day, would like to recommend it to everyone, specially for young and mature couples, the apartment was well equipped and cozy. Cheers

After finally finding Roula´s apartment through the maze of greek one-way streets we were delighted to be greeted so friendly by Roula in her beautiful apartment. Everything really looks like on the pictures, it is clean, safe and furnished with much love for the detail. Another  great plus you will appreciate after a long day in noisy Athens is that Roula´s apartment is a really quiet place where you can relax wonderfully.
Before heading out into the city we were given some good advice on where to eat and how to access public transport in the area. Especially Roula´s recommendation of the bakery "Mr. Baker"  was excellent. The main sites in the center of Athens (Akropolis, Plaka) are very close- only two metro-stations away.
We were very comfortable in the apartment and enjoyed every moment there, sadly our stay was only for one day. When we come back to spend some time in Athens we will definately stay at Roula´s place. Roula was truely an excellent host, we absoultely recommend her apartment for a stay in Athens- better than any hotel.

We had a wonderful stay in Roulas apartment and Roula was so accommodating.  The public transport was close by and Roula provided lots of information before we arrived.

On our return from Santorini Roula ensured someone was at the apartment to let us in and it was almost midnight.  I cant think of many hosts that would be so caring.

Thank you so much Roula, we will recommend your place to our family, friends and work colleagues.

Roula was a 10* host with a 10* apartment to match!! She helped us with information from how to get to the apartment to what to see and where to eat and shop!! Couldn't have asked for a more helpful host! The apartment is amazing! Had a wonderful stay - wish it could have been for longer! Thanks Roula!

We had a wonderful stay in Athens in the apartment.  Roula met us when we arrived, swiftly settled us in and gave us some good advice on where to eat and how to access public transport in the area.  The bakery, grocer, mini market and cafe shops were only 5 mins away and were excellent.  Getting the the main sites was simple (a 20mins walk or a 10min metro ride), it was wonderful to be so close to everything.  We were very comfortable in the apartment - it was clean, stylish, safe and well equipped for cooking.  We enjoyed every moment we were there, felt very relaxed and Roula was an excellent host.  We would definitely stay there again.

The appartment was great! Roula was so kind and helpful. Easy to go everywhere with the metro or bus. There was also delicious restaurants near by. We stayed here with our 2 year old son and we would definitely recommed this place. We had really nice Athens experince.
Thanks! best wishes, Tiina, Mick & Jesse from Belgium

my boyfriend and me had a really good time in athens. the apartment was perfect, clean, cozy and located in a nice and save area. roula is very helpful and lovely. we definitely recommend this apartment!
Roula's place is perfect - great location, great apartment, great host.  Will be our first port of call in Athens in future.

Roula's apart,net was charming and comfortable, and only two stops from the parthenon and downtown shopping areas. She sent me tons of great info on the neighborhood and transportation before our arrival and was quick to respond to lingering questions via email on demand. Best of all she helped my travel companions plan a special surprise birthday celebration for me, making reservations for us at a fabulous place and even called the restaurant to make sure we had arrived and were enjoying our meal! I highly recommend her place!

Roula was just the most amazing host! Invaluable advice for Athens and life in general. Even my Mum wanted to hug her from Australia for looking after her daughter so well. The apartment is awesome too!

I stayed here for a night on our last day in Greece.
Roula's apartment is great.  Clean, comfortable and cozy.  It is what is seen on the pictures, with enough space to move around comfortably.   It's almost like staying in a serviced apartment.

Roula has been very accomodating to welcome us very early in the morning when we arrive.  Thank you for that !

I would recommend her apartment as a place to rest your foot in Athens !

Lovely place right near the American embassy in Athens.  Just two metro stops away from Plaka and all of the downtown hussle and bussle - with the protests going strong in that area, Roula's place was a great location to be in, to get out of the way of it all but still be relatively close.  The thing that impressed me the most about the place was all of the recommendations she gave!  Be sure to try at least one of the restaurants and shops she recommends...  Truly a great visit and am looking forward to my next visit to Athens and to Roula's place!  Bisous de la France xx

Roula has a very cozy apartment in a convenient location. We had a short stay, and unfortunately we had not the chance to meet Roula in person, but she was in contact/available through email and phone in any moment, looking for us to have a pleasant stay.

à notre première visite à Athène, nous n'aurions pas pu mieux tomber.
Nous avons magasiné l'appartement via AIRBNB, comme nous avions fait pour SanFrancisco, au printemps.
Ce système permet de trouver des sites où le rapport qualité-prix est mis en lien avec la localisation.
Dans ce cas-ci, l'appartement de Roula s'avérait être très central aussi. De là, on pouvait  facilement se véhiculer vers l'aéroport, le centre-ville, et les monuments, le quartier PLAKA.... et ceci dans des temps très raisonnables.
Quant à l'appartement, il était propre et moderne. Tout y est neuf.
Les lits sont de très bonne qualité. Roula a vu à tout.
Nous avons d'ailleurs eu le plaisir de rencontrer Roula et de recevoir encore plus d'information. Elle est très sympathique..
Nous avons couché là trois soirs avant d'aller à Santorini et Pharos, et y sommes revenus la veille du départ.
Nous alons certainement retourner chez Roula et y référer nos amis.

Lise et Guy, Saint-Lambert, Québec, Canada.

Roula is very welcoming and informative.  Very great communication from helping you choose a restaurant to assisting with how to get to the airport by bus. A food tour she recommended was great. Apartment very well equipped and a quiet location just out of the main action.  close to transit. Good restaurants nearby.  She has put together a great little book of info that is available to guests.  Generous with supplies like coffee.

One of the best deals in our Athens trip was Roula's place.  Her apartment was a home away from home, so nice and cosy. I almost didn't want to leave =;-)  It was also accessible, near to the city center but without the hustle and bustle.
Roula, indeed, is a wonderful host. Although we didn't get to meet her personally, she made sure that everything was organized accordingly and that we have everything we needed around the apartment.
Definitely will recommend her place to all my friends =)

We spent more than three months in Roula's apartment. Together with our little daughter. I can say it's a perfect place also for a longterm stay. In the morning you wake up with the sunshine on your huge balcony and you have bright light till the late afternoon. The heating works, you have air condition in both rooms and cable TV with more channels you can watch. In 15 minutes you are by foot in the center and within five minutes by car without traffic jam on the main roads to the sea coast. There is a nice fitness club two blocks away. To make it short: We would rent the place again.

We actually stayed in Roula's new apartment near the Acropolis, not this one. The one we had was excellent, clean and child friendly. The location is great, walkable to most tourist sites and with easy access to the metro. The little garden at the back is a real gem which allows you to sit our at night or in the morning. We had all of our home meals there. We would recommend it for a couple with/without one child without hesitation. Any problems and Roula is very attentive and hospitable.

Due to last minute repairs, we were unable to occupy this apartment.  However, our host Roula put us in another apartment which was more than satisfactory (Walk on the Acropolis Side.) I will review our host who furnished a sparkling clean apartment with every possible amenity.  She quickly secured the couple of items I wanted in order to do a lot of cooking. She was very attentive but not at all obtrusive. It's hard to believe how anxious she was that we have a good experience during our month-long stay. I would highly recommend renting from Roula.

This is a lovely apartment with a homely feel to it. The balcony overlooks a courtyard-type area, which means you are not overlooked and in the mornings you hear birdsong rather than traffic noise (a rarity for the centre of Athens).

The apartment is in a safe area, just off Vasilissis Sofias Ave, which is a 30 second walk away and has regular buses running up and down it.  The Megaro Moussikis metro station is approximately a 10 minute walk away, so it’s conveniently located for public transport.  There’s a supermarket a 2 minute walk away, which has an ATM machine, plus there are plenty of places to eat within about a 5 minute walk.

Roula is based in Cyprus so I only communicated with her via email, however, I met her daughter Ellie who greets you at the apartment.  Both are lovely and very responsive if you have any queries.  Roula also made suggestions of places to visit or events that may be of interest to you, in addition to the file of useful information provided in the apartment.

After I’d moved in a friend came round to visit.  She liked the apartment so much that she decided to book it after I’d moved out.

I can’t fault Roula, Ellie or the apartment and would be very happy to stay there again.
Everything you could possible want or need for a stay in Athens. Handy to the metro and airport bus. Very comfortable apartment, everything worked perfectly.

It was a great experience as the place was very comfortable. It was a fair distance to walk to the metro station.Apart from this everything else was very good. After a tiring day in the city it was such a pleasure to come back to our lovely apartment.
The hostess was absolutely charming with two charming daughters.Three of them were always prepared to help and offering assistance .
I will recommend the place anyday to anyone
Roula was a pleasure to deal with yet again. Any extra requests were dealt with very efficiently and in a friendly manner. If I am back in Athens I will certainly return here. Many thanks.

Roula couldn't have been more helpful! She has bent over backwards to make my stay in Athens as easy and comfortable as possible. Even giving extra tips about what's on in Athens this week - what exhibitions to see. etc.
The apartment is a gem, beautifully arranged and a little oasis in the middle of the city. Have felt really relaxed and at home here. Didn't want to go home!
She was also super flexible about the length of my stay - when I wasn't quite sure how my trip would pan out or how many days I would want the apartment for.
Couldn't ask for a better host A*************

Roula's apartment is fantastic. It's tidy, well-equipped and has not only a comfy bed but also a comfy sofa bed!

The apartment is about 10 minutes walk from the Metro, and then two Metro stops away from the centre of Athens.

Roula's daughter, Ellie, gave us loads of useful tips for seeing things in Athens, and we had a very enjoyable stay.

The appartment had everything we needed. When we arrived the fridge was already filled with some basic things, like milk fruit and honey. Also there's a supermarket around the corner, and a metro station and subway nearby.

Looking at the picture I wish I was back in Athens relaxing with the French doors open looking out at the garden below.....
This place is a peaceful little sanctuary. Just off a major road, so easy for transport, yet just behind the other buildings, so no street noise!! And looking down onto the gardens of two other buildings, green in the middle of the city.
Beyond all of that, Roula is the sort of person who really just wants to make your time in Athens a joy.  She seems to have had some little treat for everyone here, me too! She travels enough to know what kind of information is helpful and how to take away the stresses of travel. She will bend over backwards to help you.
Looking forward to my return already!

2nd time I've stayed at this delightful apartment and it felt like home from home. Nothing is too much trouble for this host.
Thank you again Roula!

Roula was an amazing host and I couldn't ask for any more from the experience: super conveniently located, near shops and restaurants, and a very comfortable and modern launching pad for maximizing the most out of my brief 3 day vacation in between work jaunts.

Roula's tips and above-and-beyond care really made the trip. Having done no research into the local culture, I relied pretty much solely on her recommendations and was never once disappointed. She even looked up the bus schedule to Delphi and suggested the best local restaurant for pies upon arrival. Very much recommended and I look forward to a return visit!!

We had a wonderful stay at Roula's apartment.  It is stylish, and so comfortable that we ate in every night.  A grocery store is within walking distance.  It is a great location and a safe neighborhood.  It is off the main street just enough to be quiet and peaceful.  Most of all, Roula  and her daughter were extremely helpful in every way.  They went out of their way to print some documents for us.  We loved Greece and the people and always felt safe there.  Would love to come back again and if we do will definitely stay  with  Roula.

A very convinient location for those who would like a taste of the urbun way of living in Athens. Some of the trendiest little bars are just around the corner at Mavilli Square as well as Lycabettus Hill for great walks and the Athens Concert Hall where there is a something always on. A big choice of buses and Metro subway plus taxis will take you anywhere you like. Roula is a great host and always available to help if there is any need. Coffee and cookies were much appreciated!

Sorry for the delay in replying but since returning home I've been very sick. I wish I'd stayed in Greece!! Anyway, Roula is a wonderfully organised host and the apartment is great. We loved the fact it overlooked an inner city garden. Such a nice surprise. Roula is 100% committed to ensuring her guests have everything they need and nothing was too much trouble. The only reasons we didn't give 5 stars are I didn't like the old elevator, the foyer had a bad smell and the street was very dark where the entrance to the building is. Nothing that our dear host can change. In fact if I could give 4 and 1/2 stars I would. The apartment was excellant value for money, close to public transport and other ammenities and super clean. Despite our bad timing (the german Chancellor was in town so the city was in lock down) we had a fantastic time in Athens and look forward to spending more time there when we next go to Europe.

The apartment is located in the quiet side of athens, but highly accessible by bus and metro. Roula was responsive to our enquiries and even provided us with useful informations. The apartment is spacious to accomodate 4 of us. Highly recommended to everyone!

This was the best thoughtout apartment ever!  Met anyone's needs in a compact and modern way.  Great location.....we walked and took the metro everywhere.  Roula's husband was waiting for us at the apartment...we arrived at night.  A bottle of wine, cookies and a souvenir were waiting for us. A wonderful experience.

Nous sommes arrivés vers Minuit à l'appartement et Roula était là pour nous accueillir! Première bonne surprise...
Comme nous sommes arrivés tard, il y avait de quoi petit-déjeuner pour le lendemain.
Roula était très disponible pour nous, nous a commandé un taxi pour notre départ et nous a même offert une bouteille de vin grec et un petit souvenir.
Merci Roula!
professional service. like a good hotel, but much cheaper.
The apartment was lovely. A sunny balcony, spacious, quiet and close to everything. Roula is an excellent host and thinks of everything!
Very nice apartment very well located . perfect for a couple. walking distance to downtown and Kolonakis.
Warm and cozy place. Roula has been very helpful and informative with good recommendations. We thoroughly enjoyed our one week stay there!

My friends and I enjoyed staying at Roula's appartment very much. Upon our arrival, we were surprised to find a welcome bottle of very good wine and delicious biscuits. Roula was very supportive and helpful and made sure we were comfortable. The apartment was very cosy with a nice balcony - we will definitely go back not only to enjoy a cup of good coffee on the balcony! Thank you Roula and good luck!

Right place to stay in Athens. Near the city center, but in a really quiet street. Apartment is lovely, clean and furnished with a great taste. Perfect grocery store is nearby and kitchen is fully equipped so you can prepare what ever you want. We did :)
Roula is very good host. She organized a cot for our baby boy, sent us lot of useful information, and updated us daily on changes in public transport caused by strikes.
Perfect apartment. Excellent host. Great city.
It's just always so lovely to come back to a place you know with new things to discover and Roula, you make it such a joy.  Hope to see you soon !

L'appartement est idéal pour un séjour à Athènes. Il est très bien situé et très fonctionnel (il ne manque rien, on se sent comme à la maison ! ). Il est spatieux et sans vis-à-vis : deux fenêtres donnent sur des jardins où l'on peut voir oiseaux et tortues évoluer.
Roula est adorable et très accueillante. Son esprit pratique et son expérience facilite beaucoup le séjour.
Je recommande cet appartement à tous !
The apartment was beautiful, clean .. Everything we needed had. We are also surprised by the little things which.. it all!

Roula was an excellent host. The apartment was nice and clean and is in a very nice area of Athens. Nice quiet balcony to relax on and plenty of shops and cafes near by too. Would definitely recommend  staying here.

My boyfriend and I had a wonderful time in Athens. The appartment offers anything you need including a sunny balcony for breakfast. You can even walk to the akropoli or you take the tram. The airport is also very easily to reach.

Our stay in Athens was perfect. Roula has thought of everything! From a first aid kit, to books on Greek cooking and welcome bottle of wine and little gift, it made staying there such a pleasure. The apartment was clean, cozy, comfortable and in a great location. You would be silly to stay anywhere else in Athens! Thank you for a fantastic stay, VERY HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!
Séjour agréable, appartement confortable, bien situé avec tous les services à proximité, et Roula attentive aux demandes de ses hôtes francophones . Parfait.

I had a great time at Roula's. The apt is very well adapted for a single person or a young couple. Even if the weather is dismal or you want to stay indoors for the evening, the place is a nice quiet den. It is about two miles from the central area but it's an easy walk or short bus ride. Also Roula is very easy to talk to and manages her apt very politely and professionally. Definitely worth a return visit.

Perfect introduction to Athens, and to Greece! Wonderfully homey apartment in centrally located neighborhood, close to metro and easily accessible via airport shuttle (be sure to tell the driver your stop). Roula is the perfect hostess - friendly, knowledgeable and happy to provide suggestions to make your stay even more enjoyable. Will definitely stay again on our next trip to Greece, which will hopefully be soon.

Roula was very gracious, inviting and helpful.  The apartment had a nice balcony on a garden and was very clean.  It had everything we needed and some nice extras.  The acropolis was only a few minutes away and the metro was conveniently close and very easy to use.  We wouldn't hesitate to recommend it.  The people of Athens were also exceedingly friendly and courteous, surprising for a large city.  It's a great place for a vacation.

Roula is a great host,very kind, friendly and willing to help in whatever you need. She has a nice and centrally apartment in good condition with everything that you need. Restaurants, bars, markets, bus and train station are very close to the apartment.

Roula is a thoughtful, helpful and friendly host and I would definitely recommend staying in her apartment if you are visiting Athens. Good location, very comfy and felt like a home from home. Loved it! Thanks Roula!

Great location in Athens.  Plenty of room to relax and stretch out after vigorous days of touring.  Roula left us a wonderful notebook with suggestions for restaurants, markets, shopping and more.  She was kind enough to provide special pillows for my husband, due to his allergies.  Our first experience with airbnb was a great one!  Be sure to try the Cretan restaurant (#13 vrasida) behind the Hilton hotel.  Great suggestion by our host.
What a great apartment! Great location, walking/busing distance to everything you would need in Athens. Roula is extremely warm and helpful and made our stay really fantastic. Thanks again Roula!

Best of the best. Roula met us at the apartment and was as gracious a host could be. She had fresh oranges and pistachio cookies out for us. Also she provided a nice bottle of wine for our enjoyment upon arrival in Athens. Roula had taken time to organize informational notebooks detailing food and restaurant recommendations as well as entertainment and sites recommendations. She also provided books and pamphlets about Athens that were quite helpful for our stay. If you are planning a trip to Athens, you will do yourself a favor if you rent this apartment from Roula!

Roula's apartment is just as described: stylish, conveniently situated, with everything you need. Roula is a very thoughtful host, who provides excellent guides for eating out, shopping and getting around. Highly recommended.

Very brief stay, quaint and comfortable apartment. Did not get to experience the area around this place as we left very early to get a bus then ferry to Skiathios. Highly recommend Roula as a host- excellent directions, helpful suggestions about local attractions and places to eat.

This is hands down the best place I have stayed at for an airbnb booking. Roula has really thought about everything and it really shows in everything available in the apartment. It is also very clean and in a very safe (consular) district of Athens. I which I had stayed there longer!!

Roula was a  brilliant host and her apartment was lovely. She was very helpful and her husband, Kostas, was very helpful when Roula was away.

Definitely recommend and would stay at Roula's again :)

Beautiful cozy apartment!
We stayed two nights in Roula's place and were so happy about everything: The location, the style, the equipment and the balcony on which we had our happy hours. It is quiet and extremely clean. After a long day of walking in Athens, we were all excited to go back and relax there. We have two girls and they slept very well on the large and comfortable sofa. We highly recommend Roula's place. Plus her charming daughter who welcomed us was extremely kind and helpful. Great stay, thanks a lot Roula! Maud and family

We had a fabulous time in Athens- the Acropolis and all in that area, Lycabettus Hill, cafes & more. Roula's apartment is clean, comfortable & well located for easy access to public transport and Roula is always contactable if you need advice.

Great.
Really helpful and anticipated questions.
Good instuctions.
worth revisiting

The location was excellent, a few blocks from the Metro (Megaro Moussikis Station), close to the Hilton and American Embassy.  Apartment perfect size for a single or a couple.  Extremely clean, has everything you could possibly need. I would stay again for longer next time I come to Athens.

Roula and her daughter were very helpful and the apartment was lovely.  The apartment reflects her great style and is well equipped with things one might need--she has truly thought through making her guests feel comfortable!.
Wonderful place to visit Athens! We'll come back again! So real and good as photos show.

Roula was very gracious and her apartment was just as described and shown in the pictures.   She was always available to answer your questions!   The area feels very safe as the American embassy is nearby.   Walk to the metro is about 10-15 minutes and the bus station is even closer.

We stayed at Roula's place for 8 nights and we enjoyed every moment of it. Safe neighbourhood and conveniently located close to public transport (also to the airport).
We arrived quite late but Roula was there and made us feel very welcome. Fresh fruit, water in the fridge and cookies is just part of the service. Everything in the flat  is in good working order and WIFI was fast. Roula kept in contact and was on hand with good information and tips.

E' la nostra prima vacanza con airbnb e l'esperienza e' stata ottima.
L'appartamento di Roula è esattamente come descritto dalle foto, accogliente, luminoso, molto personale, attrezzato per ogni necessita' e pulitissimo.
Ha un bel terrazzino che affaccia sul verde di una ambasciata.
La location e' perfetta,è vicino alla metro che porta sia in centro che all'aeroporto.Facendo una passeggiata siamo andati al museo bizantino, al museo Benaki e poi fino a Monastiraki.Atene vi aspetta per essere scoperta e questa casa e' una ottima base per cominciare.
Roula,la proprietaria, e' una persona gradevolissima che vi consigliera' al meglio, e' come una fatina che vi aiutera' a vivere la favola!
Roula parla un eccellente italiano per cui la comunicazione e' facilissima e veloce.
Ritorneremo.

Roula was a very kind and informative host. We arrived quite late into Piraeus port, Roula gave us detailed written instructions in English and Greek to give to the taxi driver to get us to the apartment. The apartment was clean and spacious enough for a couple and a third wheel. The place is a few minutes walk to the bus stop, where there are many services into town ( including the x95 which goes to the airport). Thank you for the stay.

We had a wonderful time while we stay in the Roula's Apt. It's a cozy and beautiful apt as it shows in the picture. Roula is the best host that take care all we need. The apt is convenient to the most attractions. Thanks Roula!!!!

Roula's place is very centrally located -with a Metro stop nearby. She was very helpful from the start, sending lots of information about where to shop, eat and explore.  She met me when I arrived and had tea and cookies as well as a bottle of wine for our stay.  Her place is very relaxing and we felt at home the entire time.  I would visit again and recommend her highly.

I stayed in Roula's Athens apartment for 3 days with 3 friends. We had a very enjoyable stay! The apartment was very close to public transport so it was easy to get to the airport and the landmarks e.g. the Acropolis. It was also very homely, with lots of personal touches, including biscuits and wine in the kitchen provided, and plenty of toiletries for us to use.

Roula really went above and beyond to help us out, even though we never met in person. Before we arrived, she sent us a list of activities and places to eat in Athens. I also had trouble booking train tickets to my next destination and she kindly allowed me to have them sent to her private address, where they were then hand delivered to me by her daughter on arrival. Could not have asked for a more genial host!

Roula was amazing and stayed in communication the whole time. The location is amazing and so convenient to get whatever you need. The apartment was immaculate and well kept and really made us feel at home. Can't wait to go back so we can stay again
We stay just for 2 nights but we really enjoyed. The apartment is very nice and cozy, well equipped and conveniently located. Ralou and her daughter Joanna take care of us... Thanks a lot!

I wholeheartedly recommend staying at Roula’s apartment in Athens. It is in a nice neighborhood and easy to reach from the airport by metro or bus. It is perfect for a couple and it is nicely decorated with some very excellent paintings on the walls. I particularly enjoyed waking up to a lovely landscape in the bedroom and I also adored the curtains in the living room (I love fabric). The apartment is quiet and my husband and I slept very well—important so that you get the most of visiting Athens by day (and well into the night!). While I did not get the chance to meet Roula (hopefully on another occasion), we were in regular communication from the day we made the reservation and she provided us with a wealth of information. Her recommendations are excellent. We followed her lead on several occasions and really appreciated the information. Roula’s warmth and desire to share her city was evident in our exchanges and I can’t wait to visit again.

Kathleen Valencia

Roula is a perfect hostess! the apartment is beautiful and well-equipped. the location is very good!
decoration adorable! and very well kept!
Roula and her daughter are very kind! He was always very attentive to any need we could have!
everything everything, everything! Perfect! thanks a thousand times!

Ralou est une hôtesse gentille et très attentionnée . Son appartement est propre, très confortable, tranquille et il est bien situé (à 5 minutes à pied du métro et de plusieurs services). Loger chez elle fut une expérience positive que je recommande fortement.

Our host was amazing from the moment we confirmed our booking. Ralou sent attachments with directions to the apartment, things to do and transportation. Her communication was very prompt, directions accurate and precise. The apartment was gorgeous, well maintained, and the bonus was little touches like the welcome yogurt and honey, there were biscuits, toiletries and etc. We felt right at home. Great base for Athens!!
Great hosts, great apartment and location.

We spent 3 nights in Ralou's apartment and found it ideal for our situation.  It was big and spacious with a nice balcony to sit out on. We found it quite clean and well furnished.  We were able to catch up on our laundry needs with the in apartment washing machine and then use the drying rack on the balcony.  Enjoyed 3 of the several movie DVDs as well.

Apartment is located in a good neighbourhood with a Metro stop within easy walking distance.  There are several market  and grocery stores nearby as well as restaurants to choose from.   We prepared our own evening meal twice with the well equipped kitchen.  Ralou provided a wealth of information about the immediate area as well as city highlights.  She was very accommodating to any of our inquiries.  We would definitely use this location again.
Ralou's apartment is pretty cute and well located. Easy to access to the airport via bus. recommended!

Ralou was a most gracious host, and who provided us with lots of information about her flat, suggestions re. places to vist in Athens.  The flat is beautifully decorated and ideally located.  We felt very, very welcomed!  I would highly recommend a stay at Ralou's flat for anyone travelling to Athens!

Ralou is a wonderful and a kind host. I arrived very late at the apartment and she was there waiting for me! The apartment itself was super, exactly like in the photographs! I stayed at Ralou's apartment, which is located in a central and safe area in Athens and made my trip an enjoyable, fun and easy experience. I give it 100% feedback! A small gem for the one that seeks good hospitality, clean and quiet space. The veranda overlooking the gardens is a treat!
Thank you Ralou mou! Would love to stay in your apartment again and again and again!

The Stylish Apartment in the heart of Athens is an exceptional one. We enjoyed every moment staying there. Everything is near by, metro, buses and walking distance from lovely cafes. It gives the sense of the city center plus the elegance element. It is very clean and functional. The living room is cozy and the house in general is bright with big windows and balconies. We would love to come back one day Ralou, thank you for having us, I highly recommend your lovely apartment to your next guests. :-)

I cannot thank Roula enough for her wonderful hospitality!!! She is such a kind and warm person and it was such a pleasure meeting her! She made sure we had everything we could possibly need and invited us in her property like family! The apartment is in an amazing location and it covers any need you may have! Clean, spacious, bright, decorated so tastefully, it makes you feel like home! One of the bonuses of it is the balcony which overlooks a beautiful garden with many fruit trees! Makes you feel like you are escaping the city! We will definitely come back to stay at Roula's and we are happy to always say that this was our daughter's first home! :-) Thank you for everything! xoxoxo

We had the best time in Athens and we owe much of that to the fact that Ralou allowed us to use her apartment. The location is perfect! The apartment is clean and comfortable and immediately we felt very much like home. The bed was comfy and generally the whole apt has everything that you could need! The couch was absolutely comfortable.The apartent is in a central and safe area close to the metro station. I have no words for Ralou. She is by far the best host we ve ever had! Sweet and ready to help with everything we needed! I highly recommend it. Go for it and you wont regret it! Ralou a HUGE thank you for everything! Hope to see you soon!
i stayed for two nights at Ralou's place, me & my girlfriend,a week ago. Ralou is very cool and friendly. The apartment was as i expected.we really enjoyed it!
We would like to thank Ralou for her hospitality. She is making sure everything her guests need is there for them. She also goes beyond the needs with some little touches. Highly recommended host.

We had a perfect stay in Ralou's lovely apartment in Athens. Ralou is the most wonderful host, she gave us a fantastic welcome and the information she provided us with on the local area and beyond was second to none, restaurant to beat the band, exhibitions, walks you name it! The apartment is so well equipped, centrally located and very comfortable. Ralou's communications are very prompt and she is a really great lady! Thank you Ralou for making our trip to Athens!

We had a wonderful stay in Athens with Ralou. The apartment is lovely,in a great location,both for visiting athens and accessing the airport. The apartment is even nicer than the photos suggest. We had a lovely lunch of wild asparagus with feta and grilled tomatoes (from a great green grocers nearby) on the balcony,overlooking the olive and lemon trees in the garden below. Ralou is kind, thoughtful and beyond helpful. This was one if the best holiday experiences we have had. We will definately return,and stay with this lovely lady. Thankyou Ralou, you made my partners 40th birthday an amazing experience. Xxxxxxxxxx
Great apartment. Good location, clean and tidy and really nicely done out.

Ralou’s condo was fully equipped for everyday life. The kitchen, bathroom, bedroom, living room and dining area were clean, organized and efficient.

The location was excellent: close to Metro station, bus stops, grocery stores, pharmacies, bakeries, bars, coffee shops, banks and much more.
During our 2 weeks stay, we walked to the coffee shop after dinner and stayed until 10 pm many nights. Walking around the condo at night was absolutely safe.

Before our arrival and during our stay, Ralou constantly sent us detailed information of places to go, things to do, things to watch out, reminders, etc. She is truly SUPER HOSTESS!!

We will go back to Athens and will book her condo again in the future.

I spent two nights in Ralou's apartment with two friends.  It was perfect for our needs as we wanted to do a whistle stop tour of central Athens.  The apartment was well equipped for all our needs, thank you Ralou!
We had a wonderful stay in this apartment with such great tips on things to do, places to go from Ralou. Highly recommended.
Ralou is the nicest women ever! She has everything you ever need at the apartment. I could not have stayed at a better place!

I spent 6 days in April 2014 in Ralou's apartment. One word to sum it up : perfect ! It's a very nice apartment, corresponding to the pictures online, clean, with enough space for at least 3 persons, a nice balcony for the afternoon/evening sun, calm, and Ralou is a wonderful host, very helpful and rapidly responding if there's anything you may need. Supermarkets, bakerys etc are very close to the apartment, as well as metro and bus stations, which makes it very easy to visit Athens. If you prefer walking, no problem at all, the apartment is close enough to everything, I highly recommend as a start to walk to Kolonaki square and up Lycavittos hill, where you have a wonderful view on Athens.

Great apartment, handily located a five minute walk from the blue metro line which is only two stops from the city centre. The apartment was clean and tidy and close to all the amenities we needed during our stay (supermarkt,  bakery). The apartment is located in a calm and safe area. Ralou was a lovely host, she answered any questions we had immediately and provided us with plenty of sightseeing material and maps. We would definitely recommend this apartment to friends and family looking for a good place to stay while seeing the sights Athens has to offer.

Amazing apartment and host. The apartment is easily accessible by metro and near all the amenities of this great city, but is, at the same time, very calm and cozy, with an almost rural soul. Every morning, I'd wake to birds singing !


As for Ralou, she's knowledgeable, always ready to help, speaks many languages, and is a gracious person overall.

Ralou gave us a very warm welcome.
During the stay, all kind of questions (e.g. regarding activities, restaurants, go out, ...) we asked, she has answered immediately.
The Kitchen was filled with many different dainties, like home made jam, olive spread, new bread, wine, melon, strawberries, cookies, ...
The Apartment is very cozy, we felt very comfortable.
It is is very well equipped, especially the small things Ralou provided for all contingencies gave us the feeling to be at home.
Thank you so much Ralou, Uta and Ingo!

Ralou is a fantastic host. Very helpful and accommodating. She provided is with plenty of information in regards to getting to the apartment and must do's/eats in Athens.
The apartment is lovely and is even stocked with shower products and other necessities. Will definitely stay in Ralous apartment again if back in Athens. Thanks Ralou!

Our stay here was wonderful! Our host, even though she was out of country, arranged everything for us! She had a taxi pick us up and take us right to the apartment! Everything was taken care of for us, I highly recommend staying here and with this host!

We had a fantastic time! The apartment is very nice and in a very good neighborhood, lots of nice Restaurants, a great Bakery and Shops. Our host was fantastic and provided us with everything you could ask for! We will definitely come back!:)

this space was wonderful!  it's situated in a beautiful spot in athens.   in the platia mavilli section of the city - there's a square filled with trees which makes it wonderful to sit out in the evening or in the morning and have coffee or wine with great food!  everything you need is within walking distance of the apartment, including the metro which will take you anywhere you need to go in the city and beyond.  it's superb

Ralou is the most amazing hosts ever. She managed everything in the house extrenly well. Her house is pretty good for 3-4 day stay. The center of Athens is a bit confusing as where you define center is. If you think center is Akropolis you need to take a 4 euro taxi from the house. House enviroment is so good you can reach to many places market bakery shopping area etc. very easily.  If you have a ca there is no car parking problem. The only thing is you need to be quiet for the neighbours...

Very comfortable apartment in a nice neighborhood. Good amenities nearby, and easy access to the tourist areas. Ralou is a great hostess. She arranged transport for us from and to the airport, and provided many local insights for restaurants and shops. She was very responsive and helpful. We would definitely stay in one of her units again!

A very nice, clean apartment, centrally located for easy access to most of Athens. 4 euro taxi rides will get you most anywhere...10 minute walk to metro...main bus route to Acropolis just a walk to the corner.  Off the main thoroughfare enough to give you a quiet peaceful rest.. Easy access to local markets and restaurants.  You really can't miss with this rental. Lots of tips from Ralou that are right on target

We had a great time in Athens! The apartment is conveniently located within a 15 minute walk of the metro station and there are a couple of supermarkets close by in case you need to buy something. Ralou is very helpful - her travel tips are really useful - and she was kind enough to stock the fridge with a lovely breakfast and a four pack of beer (a nice thing to find when you arrive after a long flight at 10 in the night). I would certainly recommend this as a great place to stay, especially for small families.

The apartment is in a great location and very close to the metro and buses but within walking distances to a lot of places. Ralou left a folder with tips on local restaurants and Mr Baker nearby with is a wonderful bakery. The apartment is very quiet with a nice deck in the sun. It was very clean and comfortable. We thoroughly recommend it and if we go back to Athens we would have no hesitation in staying there again.

Thank you again Ralou, you are a wonderful host
Η περιγραφή ήταν ακριβής  η γειτονιά πολύ καλή και η οικοδέσποινα έκανε τα πάντα για να νιώθουμε σαν το σπίτι μας

Ralou responded to my emails very quickly and sent, in advance of our arrival, detailed information about Athens, our flat and our neighborhood including places to eat, things to do and had a special gift waiting for us! She was unable to meet us herself but arranged for a knowledgable and helpful person to assist us when we arrived.  Ralou was extremely accessible and made extra efforts to communicate - calling us shortly after our arrival to make sure everything went smoothly.  The apt. Was very quiet especially considering how close we were to a very busy, high traffic, main thoroughfare. It was nicely appointed and clean.

From the initial contact to the very last minute I knew that I was in for a special experience. Ralou took care of my every question and request, from helpful ideas on where to visit, organising me a taxi transfer on arrival and putting lovely coffee and fruit in the apartment for my convenience.
The location is perfect, a half an hour walk into the centre of the city with a metro and all that is needed nearby.
The apartment is beautifully appointed and every consideration has been taken to ensure a comfortable stay. Great wifi! And the sunshine that comes in throughout the day makes for a happy welcome feeling. As does the balcony and garden below.
I wouldn't stay anywhere else in Athens and hope to return for a longer visit next time. Thank you so much for welcoming me like a friend! Loved your city. And highly recommend your apartment to any visitors to it.

A stay at Ralou’s was the perfect introduction to Athens. We were greeted with a plate of Greek Christmas cookies and a phone call from Ralou to ensure we had arrived safely. We appreciated her tips (especially about where to eat) and her attentive communication before and during our stay.

The apartment is a beautiful blend of old and new. The best feature is the balcony overlooking a garden, which we were able to enjoy even in winter. Despite our short stay, we truly felt at home thanks to Ralou’s hospitality and would happily stay again. Σας ευχαριστώ πολύ!

Ralou kept in touch to ensure I was comfortable and had everything I need.
Listing was accurate - a lovely and cosy apartment, close to everything.

The apartment was comfortable and in a great location 5 minutes way from the Athens convention center and a pleasant 40 minute stroll to the sights and downtown. Ralou provided so much information before our arrival and took care to contact us after, we always felt we were in really good hands. She was a pleasure to deal with from beginning to end. Bed was incredibly comfortable and the apartment was clean and well stocked with everything we need for a 4 day business trip.

Very comfortable apartment in an excellent area in easy walking distance of shops, restaurants, banks, bus stops (very close to the airport bus stop) and metro line into central Athens.

Ralou was away when we arrived but made sure we were greeted warmly on arrival and then rang us as soon as she was able to ensure everything was going well.

The bed is very comfortable, the living/dining area very stylish and I enjoyed a few hours, reading some of the books provided, on the sunny balcony which overlooks a nearby garden.

The small kitchen had pretty much everything you could need,
even including a selection of tea and coffee, and the shower room was clean and the water kept warm for some time after heating.

All in all a good choice!
Een fijn appartement in een fijne buurt. Schoon, netjes, rustig. Ralou zorgt ervoor dat haar gasten zich snel thuisvoelen. We komen zeker terug.

This was our first visit to Athens (for a conference at the Hilton Hotel) and we were very pleased with the location and amenities of Ralou's apartment.  The kitchen was well equipped and the washing machine was a lifesaver during the week.  The balcony was glorious for relaxing under the Athens sun while enjoying a glass of wine after a long days of sightseeing/conference.  The proximity to the Metro and airport bus stop was ideal and within walking distance to the Hilton Hotel.  Ralou greeted us as family and provided a wealth of local information before and during our stay.  This is our fourth Airbnb and the experiences continue to be memorable.

Ralou was the perfect host. Responses to emails were immediate and she provided me with lots of valuable information in advance. She and her lovely daughter welcomed me warmly at the appartment. The flat was very clean and the location was perfect for attending a congress at the Megaron Center and just a few stations away from the city centre. I highly recommend this place!

Our stay was wonderful. The apartment was exactly as described and was clean, neat, and ready with every detail you can think of. There was tea, instant coffee and 2 types of cookies to greet us (wonderful as we were so hungry when we arrived on Sunday evening and every market closed!). Steps from all bus lines and metro service around entire city. For Americans it is also good to note that it was close to the American Embassy (we did not go there) and for Serbians, it was also close to Serbian embassy (among other embassies) so we used those locations to navigate our way back to apartment. I would definitely stay here again as everything was perfect and Ralou and her daughter were so hospitable and kind!
Excellent communication throughout stay and before. Great apartment close to Metro and shops, would highly recommend.

This was a lovely, comfortable apartment with towels provided. Eleni met me at the apartment when I arrived and provided me with maps of the surrounding area and places I had already told her I was likely to visit. The area was great for an extended stay, with a supermarket literally in the same building and a whole range of useful and attractive shops on the main street just a minute's walk away. There were regular buses and plentiful taxis from the main street and the Metro (only a few short stops from central Athens) was an easy 15 minute walk. The apartment itself was beautifully decorated with one double bedroom, a single bedroom/study plus a very comfortable sofa where it would be possible to sleep. The shower room was immaculate. There was a very large balcony too. Very pleased I  chose this accommodation and that Eleni allowed me to stay. Thank you!

The apartment is beautiful, new, quiet, spacious and clean - and the balcony is huge and lovely to relax on. We really enjoyed staying there and celebrating Christmas. The check-in was perfect as well, Eleni gave us directions and answered all our questions. The location was a 20 min walk to the nearest metro station and 3 stops to the city center. The apartment is a short walk to a street with plenty of shops, supermarkets and restaurants, so it's easy to get supplies and eat out. Also the taxis are very affordable and there were plenty of them.
Thanks a lot to Eleni who was very nice, extremely helpful and flexible about our needs (she for example arranged for a baby cot) and our check-out time.

This is a great place: extremely clean and with all new and trendy furniture and equipment. Also, the house provides a lot of practical items that are not standard like paper kitchen towels, a wide range of herbs and alcholic drinks. You can see that Eleni has put a lot of love in it. The environment is nice too. Very close to a street with shops and cafes, I felt safe walking around here at night.

The apartment of Eleni was undoubtedly the nicest place I have ever stayed using Airbnb (and I have used  it quite a lot!). It is very nicely  decorated and has anything a visitor would need for a short or longer stay. Spacious, with a very big balcony and close to the city center (using transportation). Eleni was very helpful with anything I needed. She even sent me a new iron and hairdryer when I asked for it! Very friendly and informative. If I revisit Athens, I won't think twice about where to stay!

Το ωραιότατα διακοσμημένο και πρόσφατα ανακαινισμένο διαμέρισμα της Ελένης μας πρόσφερε μια άνετη και πολυτελή διαμονή.
Ολα είναι καινούργια ,το μπάνιο υπέροχο, η κουζίνα πολύ λειτουργική το στρώμα στο διπλό κρεβάτι καταπληκτικό.Η βεράντα τεράστια.
Η οικοδομή πολύ ήσυχη και περιποιημένη.Μεγάλη ευκολία το σουπερ μαρκετ ακριβώς από κάτω.Η γειτονιά γεμάτη εύρωστα καταστήματα.
Δεν δυσκολευόμασταν να παρκάρουμε.
Μπάρβο Ελένη!

Eleni nous a accueilli avec gentillesse et décrit le fonctionnement de l'appartement de façon précise pour nous permettre de nous y installer facilement.
L'appartement est agréable, bien orienté et confortable, dans un quartier animé avec des commerces de proximité. Sa situation à 4 stations de bus de la station de métro la plus proche n'est pas un inconvénient car les bus sont nombreux et l'appartement reste central pour accéder aux différents lieux touristiques et quasiment direct de l'aéroport.
La pharmacienne la plus proche parle anglais et offre des conseils précieux en cas de souci de santé.
Merci pour les bons moments passés.

What a beautiful, light and spacious apartment! We spent 2 weeks here and had the most wonderful time. Eleni met us at the apartment when we arrived at 10pm at night, greeting us like old friends. The apartment felt so warm and welcoming - even better than the photographs led me to expect, and had everything we would need. It was extremely clean and very comfortable, and the large terrace was a welcome surprise. The area feels very safe with plenty of bakeries, coffee shops and supermarkets, with a taxi into other areas just a quick wave away. In general, people were so friendly and I lost count of the times people openly talked to me and particularly my 2 year old daughter. We had such a good time and will treasure the memories of our time in Athens.

Eleni was a great host and went out of her way to help me. The apartment was better than the images advertised and was very clean and homely. The area itself is in a good location with a variety of shops nearby, while the metro is only a short walking distance away. Overall i had a great experience and would definitely recommend this apartment and Eleni to anyone interested.
Stayed there for one week and everything was  perfect.

Attending a congress in town, I spent an entire week in Katerina's small hostel in Mets. I greatly enjoyed my stay. Even though we were both busy, Katerina still managed to find the time for an occasional chat over a cup of coffee. The rooftop garden is simply beautiful. And the place did indeed feel like a small hostel. It was exactly what I had looked for.

Estuvimos 2 noches en el Hostel. Katerina es una persona entrañable y servicial, que nos dio muy buenos consejos durante nuestra estancia en Atenas.

Se trata de una habitación completamente independiente y tranquila, con baño y un pequeño horno-cocina, situado a escasos minutos del centro de la ciudad. Está en el patio de la casa que es precioso.

We stayed in Katerina's hostel for one night. we arrived late at night, and katerina was very kind and tried to help us. although we were late for more than an hour, a friend of katerina's waited for us till we arrived. the neighborhood is very nice.
But, unfortunately we found a small room, very hot and full with mosquitoes. the shower was so small. that basically you need to stand on the toilet.
We will not stay there again.

Warmly welcomed  by Katerina , I could feel like home in this "little ,tiny private house" in the garden/courtyard of Katerina's house...
Mets is an excellent location for being very close to the city center and enjoy a non-touristic (but genuine) area of Athens with a "village atmosphere" (shops, cafes...)

I really enjoyed my stay at Katerina's. I stayed for a full week and found it was in a very nice area, very quiet at night so one could sleep well. I always got the trolley bus into Syntagma square which was easy (no's 2, 4, 11)  any time of day or night. At night I could wander around Mets feeling very safe. Amazingly only 5 mins walk to the renowned jazz club: Half Note !! Lots of nice tavernas, bars etc. in Mets. Katerina was friendly, and kindly helped me with my Greek. The small hostel was great for one person but two people could easily have been comfortable there.   Megaritis is an excellent place to eat dinner.  I would definitely stay there again.

We stayed at Katerina's studio for one night, the location is perfect for a brief visit and very well connected. The area is nice and communication with Katerina went smoothly. The terrace on the roof is amazing, a pity not having time to enjoy breakfast up there! The studio doesn't look exactly like the pictures and shower is a bit uncomfortable, but it's still perfect if you need an easy place to stay in the city.

Katerina's was warm and friendly despite my arrival and stay on a particularly busy weekend of hers. The guest house was spacious and cozy and a treat to stay in-- the only hiccup was a slightly dated bathroom, but it functioned perfectly nonetheless. All in all a great stay, I only wish I could have visited Athens for longer!

I visited with Katerina during Easter, and I was so warmly welcomed by her and her family. The location is amazing; Mets is a fantastic place to take walks, enjoy cafes, to wander. It's very easy to get to the more touristy areas of the city, but the Katerina's neighborhood is more quiet and residential. Two bustling squares are a 5-minute walk away, if you want to enjoy dinner and drinks out. The apartment is small, but perfect for a short stay. I cooked dinner each night there. There's a convection oven with two burners and a fridge, but it's not a kitchen-lover's kitchen. The set-up is a bit challenging. I ate dinner on the lovely patio and rooftop terrace, and Katerina very kindly invited me in to share coffee and a chat each night. It was a very pleasant stay overall.
Perfect time with katerina highly recommanded

L'appartement est très agréable et plutôt bien situé dans un quartier calme.
Il est à 15min a pied du quartier Plaka.
Nous avons bien été accueilli avec une limonade faite avec les citrons du jardin.
Rapport qualité / prix intéressant pour un appartement proche des quartiers touristiques d'Athènes.

Very friendly welcome. We enjoyed the roof terrace and the location near the central, on a good walking distance. Try the Odeon Bar nearby for the first coffee  in the evening and the last drink on the way home.

Very nice room in wonderful neighborhood.  Only a few minutes walk from the Acropolis and other tourist sites but feels far removed from tourist areas.
Katerina was very welcoming and helpful.
Small as it says - and cosy. You get a feeling of living in Athens when you stay here.

Perfect. A lovely welcome from Katerina with homemade lemonade. The neighbourhood was peaceful, pretty and very central. The place was great - a real sanctuary amidst the heat and stress of Athens. Whole hearted recommendation from us.
Thanks Katerina!

The stay at Katerina's place was perfect: the little studio was fine, private and clean, on walking distance to the Acropolis, and above all Katerina made me feel very welcome by inviting me in her kitchen activities...  I really can recommend her place to others who want to get an impression of local life in Athens.

I had a fantastic stay at Katerina's Athens studio. I felt welcome straight away. The studio is wonderful, with everything you need including fresh coffee and a stove top coffee maker. It was comfortable and clean. The neighbourhood was great, walking distance to all attractions and a lovely atmosphere on the local streets. I started my stay jetlagged roaming the cemetery and old olympic stadium which was delightful. A very enjoyable stay and I would come back. Thank you Katerina :)

Charming little house, with a gorgeous, plant-filled courtyard to sit in. The neighborhood is really sweet-- cool coffee shops and things only a few blocks away, and all the museums and sites within walking distance. Hosts were incredibly welcoming, helpful and kind, and the studio was private while being close to the larger house, so that I felt they were there should any need arise. I would stay again-- a perfect way to land in Athens. Many thanks!

Katerina's place was perfect for our stay in Athens. The space was clean and had everything we needed. Within walking distance from the Acropolis and the metro. Katerina's boyfriend greeted us with homemade lemonade and then brought us some delicious Greek dishes he had made himself. The neighborhood was quiet and full of shops and cafés. The only issue we had was that the wireless connection was not very strong. We had a great stay and would recommend Katerina's place to anyone staying in Athens.

We loved our stay at Katerina's flat. The neighborhood was wonderful -- a good grocery and bakery and good restaurants -- and ideally located for walking to all the sites in the Athens. The flat was clean and quiet and Katerina and her friends Nikos and Panos were very helpful. We did have some trouble with Mosquitos so bug spray was a must.
a lovely garden house in a quiet but lovely neighborhood.

We had a wonderful time in Katerina's studio. The place is perfectly located in Athens in a nice neighborhood in walking distance to the Acropolis.
The room is well equipped and tastefully furnished. Katerina was very helpful and friendly.

Accueil très chaleureux. On se sent rapidement chez soi. Katerina est très attentionnée et nous avons aimé le raisin et  les pistaches fraîches si gentiment offerts!  La maison est très calme et bien située. Les conseils et les bonnes adresses de Katerina rendent le séjour agréable. Totalement recommandé pour un bon moment a Athènes.
Thank you it was a nice accomodation with kindness and hospitality!!

Appartamento molto carino ed accogliente. Il quartiere è tranquillo e piacevole con ottimi piccoli ristoranti. Katerina è una persona discreta e ospitale. Abbiamo apprezzato molto la possibilità di scambiare opinioni intorno ad un bicchiere di vino sui diversi stili di vita in Italia e in Grecia.

Our boat was late but Katerina had arranged for a friend to wait for us and give us the key and show us the room, which helped a lot. We met her the next day and she was great giving us some tips and inviting us to coffee.

The room has everything you need for a short stay, refrigerator, small kitchenette, and a funny shower inside the bathroom.

It is five minutes away from two of the must-see monuments in Athens and 15 minutes walking to the Acrópolis. The location is one of the best things, quiet but close to the city center and with nice bars and restaurants in the neighbourhood.

I would recommend staying here.
Zeer vriendelijke en snelle reactie, mooi lokatie in een rustige buurt met alle belangrijke zaken op loopafstand.

We really felt welcome at Katerina's place in Athens. She gave us good recommendations for two Tavernas not far away from the appartment and we have had a good dinner at both evenings we stayed in Athens.

The appartment is really special (in a good way) - it's like a smallsmall house. It's quiet and cosy.
Thank you! We would come again!

Katerina was really welcoming and careful.
The apartment, as described, is small but very cosy and well equipped.
The neighborhood (Mets) is nice and safe, with shops, cafés and restaurants quite close.
I truly enjoyed my stay.

Katerina was a great host she gave us great directions and help and even offered to help us with our laundry.
The neighborhood was great and space very central to walking around city.
While the space was very small it was usable for resting at night.

Nice appartment with a lot of privacy, short distance to all the highlights of Athens. Katerina was
very hospitable. Thank you Katerina,
Lenus & Marijana
Great locale in Athens with lots of cafes, restaurants, supermarket close by and, the highlight, easy walking distance to the Plaka, Acropolis and Syntagma Square.

Avantages: à 20 mintutes de l'Acropole et de La Plaqua à pieds.
Mais pas un appartement, seulement une petite chambre. Pas la  vaisselle indispensable*. Pas de table à l'intérieur..Lit de 120 pour pouvoir accéder à la SDB.SDB très médiocre: fuites, finitions nulles, eau chaude DANGEREUSE.
* uniquement une poêle..qui ne rentre pas dans le four...
Enfin, jardin= arrière cours. Nous avons été accueillis par la sœur de K, puis nous n'avons plus persone..
Photo trés trompeuse...

I had a very nice stay here in this charming area & sweet little studio in Katerina's pretty garden. It was perfect for what I needed- quiet, clean, has a kettle, fridge & little ring burner if you want a simple meal. I slept like a log in the double bed, and as it was late October Katerina made sure there were plenty of blankets & an extra heater in case I got cold.

She helped me with ideas of things to do, places to eat & directions, and seems a wealth of information! Katerina was very nice & friendly but also gave me my privacy-- a great balance.

From the studio it is only a 15 minute walk to so many sights, and I found my way around no problem.

Just be aware that the bathroom (where the only sink is) is small & more like a wetroom as the shower is *in* it.

I really enjoyed staying here in a real Athens neighbourhood, and if you are looking for a quiet, private but not expensive place to stay in a lovely leafy green area of Athens, do check it out. I found it to be quite charming and Katerina a very good host.
Everything cosy, perfect and a warm-welcome feeling !
Katerina is a very good hostess. The place was exactly what I needed to visit Athens, not far from the center and cosy.

Katerina's lovely home could not have been a better choice. The location was easy walking distance to the heart of Athens and the cozy house was perfect for a solo traveler. Even in the winter with a little rain and some cooler Greece weather my stay was wonderful; coming home to Katerina's humble and comfortable room was just what I needed. Thank you!

Katerina and her daughter were extremely welcoming, offering us lemonade and soup on arrival. The space offered was small but really cozy and was just a lovely place to come back to. The only cons would be that the wifi has a really weak connection from the room and you have to stay outside if you want to get a better connection. Also, the shower probably needs to be better described in the ad as the bathroom is just a wet room with a handheld shower head. Thanks for everything Katerina and thank your daughter for helping us when needed too! :)
Great place. Location was excellent for a quiet neighborhood. Very clean. Katerina's daughter was very helpful and sweet. Loved the stay!

It was just amazing to stay at her house! my friend and I was having trouble finding her place because of the bad weatehr when we arrived, so we called her and she spoke to taxi driver for us( we were having a language barrier with taxi driver) so we got to her house without anymore trouble. She welcomed us with homemade lemonade, and told us how and where to go in Athens.  Also, the place we stayin in was cozy and comfortable. bathroom is little small but it was a personal bathrooom just for us. I would love to stay at her house again if  I ever visit Athens in the future!

The accommodation is located in a real urban neighborhood. Katerina was a very friendly and warm hearted host. She made us feel welcome. The cosy room and the terras has been perfect for our stay in athens! Thank you Katrina for the good time!

We had a great stay at Katerina's place. She was very friendly, easy going and welcoming. The place is small, but since we were out all day it was enough for sleeping. Katerna's place is located in a very nice neighborhood, with nice cafe's and restaurants. It is very central in Athens, walking distance to most interesting places like Akropolis. We can definitely recommend to stay with Katerina.
Best regards,
Robin and Panos

Katerina's apartment is located in an urban, but peaceful neighborhood, in comfortable walking distance from the centre. Our room was clean and very cozy. I also really liked the interior: wooden furniture with a lot of character and some whimsical decorative details strewn in.

We were greeted by a friend of Katerina's, which worked perfectly. He was charming and very helpful, recommending a great place for dinner. Katerina, who we met the following day, was just as warm and welcoming, providing us with lemonade, coffee and more tips. I'd love to stay here again when in Athens.
Small cozy apartment in a very central and local area. Host was a great help in arranging airport transfers and exploring the area

Le logement est plutôt un joli studio qu'une chambre indépendante, Il y a une cuisine séparée et une salle de bains. On a pu profiter d'une vue imprenable sur Athènes et l'Acropole. Souzana et son mari ont été des excellents hôtes. On a pu discuter pas mal des choses et ils nous ont partagé leur connaissance de l'histoire grecque et plein conseils sur la ville. C'est un vrai plaisir de pouvoir ainsi découvrir une ville avec des habitants!  On espère les voir de nouveau si on revient à Athènes. C'est notre meilleure expérience sur Airbnb.

The ¨room¨ is more a cozy, private studio with kitchen and bathroom. The view from the terrace is a beautiful scene over Athens, and specifically the Acropolis. We enjoyed discussing with them (specially their knowledge on the history of Greece and some tips from the city) . It is such a pleasure to be able to discover a city with locals! We really hope to see them again in the next trip to Athens. This was our best experience with Airbnb.

By Souzana we had one of our best Airbnb experience. We got our own appartement at the rooftop with a breathtaking view to whole Athen from the sea till the mountains. We could enjoy our breakfast with fresh orange juice while watching at the Acropolis. From Souzana and her husband we got nice and helpful tipps, what to see, where to eat and also some interesting history details of the sites. We definetely recommend her place to everybody!

Alexis and Souzanna made me feel very welcome - not only with words but also with fruits and even a nice little dinner night on the rooftop. The studio is small, it is essentially just a bedroom, a small kitchenette, and a shower room/toilet. But it has all it needs! It even has two little 'front gardens' outside, the one at the back with absolutely stunning views. The quiet location at the edge of Pangrati is ideal for exploring Athens.
